item.title: FTX News: Bloomberg, FT, NYT Appeal Court Decision To Redact Customer Names
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
FTX News: Four media outlets Bloomberg, Dow Jones & Company, The New York Times, and The Financial Times appealed against a bankruptcy judge’s decision to permanently redact customer names of crypto exchange FTX. item.title: Bloomberg Analyst Mike McGlone On BlackRock Bitcoin ETF, BTC Price $40K, And Recession
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Bitcoin hit a one-year high of $31,400, a price last seen before the May 2022 Terra-LUNA crisis that collapsed and started a set of troubles for the crypto market. Notable analysts and experts predict an upcoming BTC price rally, Bloomberg Intelligence’s senior strategist Mike McGlone warns of many headwinds for Bitcoin price to hit $40,000.

The post Bloomberg Analyst Mike McGlone On BlackRock Bitcoin ETF, BTC Price $40K, And Recession appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Peter Schiff Disses Bitcoin Rally, Says “the Party Will Soon End”
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Anti-Bitcoin (BTC) proponent and market analyst Peter Schiff has expressed pessimism at the recent price rally of Bitcoin (BTC) and altcoins in general.
